required.name: Belarus
required.note:
Visas are issued on arrival at the Minsk International Airport
if the support documents were submitted not later than 3 business days before expected date of arrival.

required.name: Bhutan
required.note: Pre-approved visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: Cameroon
required.note: Pre-approved visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: China
required.note: 72-hours visa free visit when in transit at Beijing, Chengdu, Chongqing, Dalian, Guangzhou, Guilin, Shanghai, Shenyang, Xi'an and Guangdong Province.

required.name: Eritrea
required.note: Pre-approved visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: Ghana
required.note: Pre-approved visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: Kazakhstan
required.note: Pre-approved visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: Liberia
required.note: Pre-approved visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: Libya
required.note: Pre-approved visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: Nigeria
required.note: Pre-approved visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: Pakistan
required.note: Visa on arrival when travelling on business valid for 30 days. Conditions apply.

required.name: Russia
required.note: Visa on arrival (72 hours) for Kaliningrad Oblast (70 €) with appointment at least 72 hours in advance

required.name: Sierra Leone
required.note: Pre-approved visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: Turkmenistan
required.note: Pre-approved visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: Uzbekistan
required.note: Pre-approved visa can be picked up on arrival. No requirement for tourist voucher or invitation letter from Uzbekistan.

required.name: Vietnam
required.note: Pre-arranged 1, 3, or 6 month visa obtained online through travel agencies are available at Ho Chi Minh, Hanoi, Phu Quoc, or Danang airports. 30 day visa exemption at Phu Quoc Island.

not-required.name: Austria
not-required.note: Freedom of movement; ID card valid

not-required.name: Belgium
not-required.note: Freedom of movement; ID card valid

not-required.name: Bulgaria
not-required.note: Freedom of movement; ID card valid

not-required.name: Canada
not-required.note: 6 months; eTA required if arriving by air from March 15, 2016.

not-required.name: Croatia
not-required.note: Freedom of movement; ID card valid

not-required.name: Cyprus
not-required.note: Freedom of movement; ID card valid

not-required.name: Czech Republic
not-required.note: Freedom of movement; ID card valid

not-required.name: Denmark
not-required.note: Freedom of movement (DK); ID card valid

not-required.name: Dominican Republic
not-required.note: Nationals of Slovak Rep. traveling as tourists, must buy a Tourist Card on arrival. Fee: USD 10.- for 30 days.

not-required.name: Estonia
not-required.note: Freedom of movement; ID card valid

not-required.name: Finland
not-required.note: Freedom of movement; ID card valid

not-required.name: France
not-required.note: Freedom of movement (in Regions of France); ID card valid

not-required.name: Germany
not-required.note: Freedom of movement; ID card valid

not-required.name: Greece
not-required.note: Freedom of movement; ID card valid

not-required.name: Hungary
not-required.note: Freedom of movement; ID card valid

not-required.name: Iceland
not-required.note: Freedom of movement; ID card valid

not-required.name: Indonesia
not-required.note: 30 days. Not available at all entry points.

not-required.name: Republic of Ireland
not-required.note: Freedom of movement; ID card valid

not-required.name: Italy
not-required.note: Freedom of movement; ID card valid

not-required.name: Latvia
not-required.note: Freedom of movement; ID card valid

not-required.name: Liechtenstein
not-required.note: Freedom of movement; ID card valid

not-required.name: Lithuania
not-required.note: Freedom of movement; ID card valid

not-required.name: Luxembourg
not-required.note: Freedom of movement; ID card valid

not-required.name: Malta
not-required.note: Freedom of movement; ID card valid

not-required.name: Netherlands
not-required.note: Freedom of movement (European Netherlands); ID card valid

not-required.name: Nicaragua
not-required.note: 90 days; all visitors are required to obtain a Tourist Card on arrival. Fee: USD 10.-

not-required.name: Norway
not-required.note: Freedom of movement; ID card valid

not-required.name: Poland
not-required.note: Freedom of movement; ID card valid

not-required.name: Portugal
not-required.note: Freedom of movement; ID card valid

not-required.name: Romania
not-required.note: Freedom of movement; ID card valid

not-required.name: Slovenia
not-required.note: Freedom of movement; ID card valid

not-required.name: Spain
not-required.note: Freedom of movement; ID card valid

not-required.name: Sweden
not-required.note: Freedom of movement; ID card valid

not-required.name: Switzerland
not-required.note: Freedom of movement; ID card valid

not-required.name: United Kingdom
not-required.note: Freedom of movement (in Constituent countries); ID card valid

not-required.name: United States
not-required.note: 90 days on arrival from overseas; ESTA (valid for 2 years when issued) required if arriving by air or cruise ship.

evisa.name: Australia
evisa.note: 90 days on each visit in 12-month period if granted

evisa.name: Ivory Coast
evisa.note: 3 months; eVisa holders must arrive via Port Bouet Airport.

evisa.name: Gabon
evisa.note: Electronic visa holders must arrive via Libreville International Airport.

evisa.name: India
evisa.note: 30 days, e-visa holders must arrive via 16 designated airports.

evisa.name: Kenya
evisa.note: 3 months; also visa on arrival until 1 September 2015

evisa.name: Myanmar
evisa.note: 28 days, eVisa holders must arrive via Yangon, Nay Pyi Taw or Mandalay airports.

on-arrival.name: Bahrain
on-arrival.note: 14 days. Visa is also obtainable online.

on-arrival.name: Cambodia
on-arrival.note: 30 days. Visa is also obtainable online.

on-arrival.name: Egypt
on-arrival.note: 30 days; visa required, except for a max. stay of 15 days for holders of normal passports, traveling as tourists and arriving at Sharm El Sheik (SSH), Saint Catherine (SKV) or Taba (TCP) airports and remaining in the Sinai resorts.

on-arrival.name: Lebanon
on-arrival.note: 1 month extendable for 2 additional months; granted free of charge at Beirut International Airport or any other port of entry if there is no Israeli visa or seal, holding a telephone number, an address in Lebanon, and a non refundable return or circle trip ticket.

on-arrival.name: Somalia
on-arrival.note:
30 days, provided an invitation letter issued by the sponsor has been submitted
to the Airport Immigration Department at least 2 days before arrival.

on-arrival.name: Tajikistan
on-arrival.note: 45 days at Dushanbe International Airport. Visa also available online. E-visa holders can enter through all border points.

on-arrival.name: Zambia
on-arrival.note: 90 days; also eligible for a universal visa allowing access to Zimbabwe.

on-arrival.name: Zimbabwe
on-arrival.note: 3 months; also eligible for a universal visa allowing access to Zambia.
